question: Imagine you are working on the WheelEasy map again and a critical bug emerges during peak usage, preventing users from accessing accessibility information.  How do you prioritize your next steps?
During your time at PwC, you worked with a large dataset.  Reflecting on that experience, what was your most valuable learning regarding data preprocessing?
In developing Resumagic, you used AWS Lambda.  Imagine the cost of Lambda functions unexpectedly skyrockets. What is your initial course of action?
During your time leading ParmarthNGO, you had to make quick decisions under pressure. Can you describe a situation where your initial plan didn't work, and how you adapted?
Reflecting on the development of Findr by OpuLnt, what was the biggest challenge you encountered related to designing secure systems, and how did you overcome it?
